item.title: 537 - Obama for America TV Ad
item.description: My first Presidential campaign was in 2000--537 votes made the difference. Your vote could be the difference in 2012: http://t.co/GmYlqHsx
item.content:encoded: My first Presidential campaign was in 2000--537 votes made the difference. Your vote could be the difference in 2012: http://t.co/GmYlqHsx Make your voice heard, vote: http://OFA.BO/7oEdyo Voiceover: "Five hundred and thirty seven. The number of votes that changed the course of American history." Newscast: "Florida is too close to call" Voiceover: "The difference between what was..." Voiceover: "And what could have been..." "So this year, if you're thinking that your vote doesn't count.That it won't matter. Well, back then, there were probably at least 537 people, who felt the same way." Announcer: "Make your voice heard. Vote." Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: youtube.com

item.description: Rep. Jim Moran's Son Resigns Over James O'Keefe Video http://t.co/Jn31BG6g via @ryanjreilly
item.content:encoded: Rep. Jim Moran's Son Resigns Over James O'Keefe Video http://t.co/Jn31BG6g via @ryanjreilly Patrick Moran, son of Rep. Jim Moran (D-VA), resigned from his father's campaign on Wednesday after conservative activist James O'Keefe released a video that shows him offering advice to an undercover videographer who claimed to want to commit voter fraud. "Effective immediately, I have resigned from the Moran for Congress campaign," Patrick Moran said in a statement to TPM… Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: FACEBOOK: I WANT MY FRIENDS BACK http://t.co/xqBlnBKP via @dangermindsblog If you want to send Facebook a message, please feel free to use our graphics for your Facebook page THE BIGGEST ‘BAIT N’ SWITCH’ IN HISTORY? This has been brewing since around May. At least that’s when we first started noticing it here at Dangerous Minds and we certainly weren’t the only ones. Spring of 2012 was when bloggers, non-profits, indie bands, George Takei, community theaters, photographers, caterers, artists, mega-churches, high schools, tee-shirt vendors, campus coffee shops, art galleries, museums, charities, food trucks, and a near infinite variety of organizations; individuals from all walks of life; and… Link - Trackbacks

item.title: NBA.com: NBA to change All-Star ballot, eliminating center
item.description: NBA to change All-Star ballot, eliminating center - http://t.co/O2qIB4tr http://t.co/ycSoC346
item.content:encoded: NBA to change All-Star ballot, eliminating center - http://t.co/O2qIB4tr http://t.co/ycSoC346 The league will announce Wednesday a change to its All-Star ballot that will, for the first time, allow fans to vote for three undefined "frontcourt" players instead of having to vote for two forwards and a center. With more and more teams playing smaller than in the past, the definition of "center" was becoming increasingly difficult -- not to mention finding enough quality big men for whom to vote. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: nba.com
